title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. - Addendum 2 – (Un)FIT
description:
May 2, 2019 / On this week's Addendum, Rabia is joined by Amelia McDonell-Parry and Larry Smith Jr., a former Baltimore Police Internal Affairs detective, to discuss episode two of The State v. Keith Davis, Jr. Learn more about how use of force investigations should be conducted and hear why the Force Investigation Team's efforts to investigate the police shooting of Keith Davis Jr. did NOT measure up.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Best Fiends, The Bouqs Company, and Linzess.

Download Best Fiends for free on the Apple App Store or Google Play.

www.BOUQS.com enter UNDISCLOSED to get 20% off
